Pre-Game Insights: India will take on Sri Lanka in a three-game ODI series after the Men in Blue whitewashed the hosts in the T20Is.
Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli return to action for the first time after their T20I retirements.
Charith Asalanka and the Lankans will look to avenge their T20I series loss and kick-start the ODIs on a winning note.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The R.Premadasa Stadium in Colombo has produced spin-friendly tracks where batters tend to struggle.
The average score of the venue is 256 in ODIs.
Others: India will be the favourites to win the series with a stacked lineup full of world-beaters.

Sri Lanka squad: Charith Asalanka (C), Pathum Nissanka, Avishka Fernando, Kusal Mendis, Sadeera Samarawickrama, Kamindu Mendis, Janith Liyanage, Nishan Madushka, Wanindu Hasaranga, Dunith Wellalage, Chamika Karunaratne, Maheesh Theekshana, Akila Dananjaya, Dilshan Madushanka, Matheesha Pathirana, Asitha Fernando.
